holidays.title: American Chess Day
holidays.description: A game of strategy and skill, chess is played the world over by young and old.

holidays.title: Building and Code Staff Appreciation Day
holidays.description: We celebrate this day because building, securing, and zoning buildings is hard work.

holidays.title: Cherry Popover Day
holidays.description: Forget your worries and treat yourself to a scrumptious cherry popover on this holiday.

holidays.title: Chicken Boy Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the birthday of the man with a chicken head!

holidays.title: Ginger Cat Appreciation Day
holidays.description: See a ginger, pet a ginger! Let us celebrate our uniquely colored and affectionate feline companions.

holidays.title: International Cabernet Day
holidays.description: Get your wine glasses ready for some Cabernet this International Cabernet Day!

holidays.title: National Acne Positivity Day
holidays.description: Come and fall in love with yourself this National Acne Positivity Day!

holidays.title: National Child Identity Theft Awareness Day
holidays.description: This National Child Identity Theft Awareness Day, learn about protecting your children in a digitized world.

holidays.title: National No Rhyme Nor Reason Day
holidays.description: Put your thinking caps on and play around with words that don’t rhyme at all.

holidays.title: National Tofu Day
holidays.description: It is National Tofu Day, so bring out those chopsticks and dipping sauces.

holidays.title: Pink Cadillac Day
holidays.description: Sideburns, hip thrusts, and a pink Cadillac — dare to live larger than life.

holidays.title: Slovakia Constitution Day
holidays.description: Slovakia Constitution Day is the perfect excuse to fill your belly with potato dumplings and beer.

holidays.title: Uzbekistan Independence Day
holidays.description: Get your passport ready for a trip through the pages of Uzbekistan's history.

holidays.title: Wattle Day
holidays.description: Wattle Day was intended to promote and enhance patriotism in the then-new nation of Australia.

holidays.title: World Letter Writing Day
holidays.description: World Letter Writing Day is a day that is dedicated to expressing yourself in writing!

holidays.title: Barry Gibb’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are staying alive thanks to this mega superstar’s musical genius! Let’s celebrate!

holidays.title: Chanel West Coast’s Birthday
holidays.description: This sweet reality star has made an unforgettable impact on the entertainment industry.

holidays.title: Dr. Phil’s Birthday
holidays.description: The doctor is in, so let’s learn more about psychologist and published author, Dr. Phil.

holidays.title: Jungkook’s Birthday
holidays.description: This accomplished singer and dancer has found favor with fans around the world.

holidays.title: Zendaya’s Birthday
holidays.description: This award-winning actress has made a splash in Hollywood and has become an inspiration to all.
